Orb.Name: Future Sight
Orb.Effect: Delay moves have their damage and effects delayed for a specified number of rounds. Damage is rolled when the move is used, taking +dmg and -dmg effects on the user into account immediately. All delayed moves land regardless of the status of the user, including death or stun.

Orb.Name: Augur
Orb.Effect: Before accuracy, the user may choose to give this move Delay-1 for an additional 5 damage or +3 Critical Range on this move, or Delay-2 for both.

Orb.Name: Echo Burst
Orb.Effect: Before accuracy, the user may choose to give this move Delay-1. If they do, it loses Splash, but the user gains +5 DR until the move deals damage.

Orb.Name: Scry
Orb.Effect: The user gains +5 damage on their next attack. Before accuracy, the user may give this move Delay-1 to extend this attack's Cone by 1.

Orb.Name: Spirit Shackle
Orb.Effect: This move has Delay-X, where X is the number of Foes hit. This move is immune to outside factors. This does not add MAG.

Orb.Name: Dawn Break
Orb.Effect: This ability has Delay-2. Until this ability hits, all of the user's attacks on the target have -1 MR. The user may increase the Delay by 1 for an additional -1 MR on the target.

Orb.Name: Prismatic Burst
Orb.Effect: The user may choose to add Delay-X to this ability to give it +X dice, where X is the amount of targets hit.

Orb.Name: Omen
Orb.Effect: The user's next attack has an extra turn of delay with a doubled delay bonus.

Orb.Name: Foresight
Orb.Effect: This may be used when the user is attacked, after damage is rolled. After additive damage factors, 15% of the attack's damage is removed and added to all of the user's currently delayed attacks.

Orb.Name: Prophecy
Orb.Effect: All the user's currently delayed moves hit at the same time as this attack.

Orb.Name: Corruption
Orb.Effect: This attack inflicts 5 Poison/1 on hit. Before accuracy, the user may choose to give this move Delay-1 for extending the Poison duration by 1 round, or Delay-2 for +5 poison damage.

Orb.Name: Requite
Orb.Effect: This move has Delay-1 and a Delay bonus of +15 damage if the user dies before this attack hits.

Pendulum.Name: Oscillations
Pendulum.Effect: The user may have up to three Momentum at once. For each Momentum, the user gains +1 MP. Momentum can be spent regardless of how much MP was used this turn. The user starts each game with 1 Momentum.

Pendulum.Name: Entrance
Pendulum.Effect: For one round, if the user is targeted by the target, the user gains 1 Momentum. This move can be used even while sealed.

Pendulum.Name: Torment
Pendulum.Effect: After accuracy, the user may spend 1 Momentum to either extend the effect of the user's next Pendulum Standard/Full by one round (including statuses), or gain 2d8+1 damage (affected by Dowse if used this turn) on the user's next Pendulum Standard/Full.

Pendulum.Name: Action and Reaction
Pendulum.Effect: This move can only be used at the start of the user's turn. The user permanently sacrifices 1 MP to increase their Momentum cap by 1, preserving their Momentum stacks. The user gains the ability to passively generate 1 Momentum after using a Standard/Full besides Dash. (A maximum of 1 Momentum can be generated per turn.) Dowse is disabled for one round.

Pendulum.Name: Dowse
Pendulum.Effect: This move can only be used at the start of the user's turn. The user's next Pendulum attack this turn unremovably gains advantage damage rolls on its base dice and -2 damage, but the passive Momentum generation of Action and Reaction is disabled until reactivation.

Pendulum.Name: Hallucinations
Pendulum.Effect: The user may choose "Dream" or "Nightmare". Dream: The user gains two Momentum, while the target gains +3 DR/1 or +3 DMG/1 (chosen by the user). Nightmare: If the target uses a Once/Twice/Thrice move on their next turn, they take 3d8+5 damage. At the expense of two Momentum, such moves of the target deal 75% damage for one round.

Pendulum.Name: Clacker Volley
Pendulum.Effect: Both targets are inflicted with Confusion/1. If both targets have successfully hit the user with a Standard/Full attack in the last round, one of them (chosen by the user) is also Sealed/1. The seal's duration cannot be increased.

Pendulum.Name: Angular Momentum
Pendulum.Effect: The user spends any number of Momentum to gain +2 EVAs per 2 Momentum for one round. The user may choose to spend an additional Momentum to extend this buff's duration to two rounds.

Pendulum.Name: Mass Hysteria
Pendulum.Effect:
The user can spend 1 Momentum per effect to give this ability any combination of the following effects: 

- Make this attack Burst 2,
- Use this move as a Standard,
- Reduce the damage of the next Standard/Full attack of each target hit by 2d4+3,
- Inflict Confusion/2 to every target hit.

If this attack misses more than one target as a Standard, the user gains one Momentum.

Pendulum.Name: Hypnotic Daze
Pendulum.Effect: If the target uses a non-Basic, non-Weapon move in the next two rounds, they take 3d6+3 bomb damage. For one Momentum, the target's Frees and Triggers become Swifts for one round. If Dowse was used this turn, this move has +1 ACC.

Pendulum.Name: Nihil
Pendulum.Effect: If the target does not buff the user on their next turn, they take 7d4+4 damage. The target may target foes in their Range 3 with buffs classified as Self, Ally, Self or Ally, etc. while under this effect. (Buffs whose effect references a Passive have no effect, but fulfill the requirement.)

Pendulum.Name: Shatter Psyche
Pendulum.Effect: If the target deals 45+ damage on their next turn, they take an additional 4d8+5 damage. The user may decrease the required damage threshold by spending any number of Momentum; each Momentum spent decreases it by 6.

Tarot Cards.Name: Discard
Tarot Cards.Effect: On an accuracy roll of 15+, the user gains 1 Discard stack. As a Reaction to an attack of a Foe within Range 4 after its accuracy roll, the user may spend one stack to give that attack -2 ACC.

Tarot Cards.Name: Maverick
Tarot Cards.Effect: By default, roll a d4 after rolling damage. This determines damage multiplication: 1 = 0.5x, 2 = 1x, 3 = 1.5x, 4 = 2x. The user may choose to not roll the d4 before damage.

Tarot Cards.Name: Roulette
Tarot Cards.Effect: Roll a 1d8 to inflict a random status on the opponent, then roll a d3. If the d3 roll is 1, status the user instead. Statuses: 1 = 10 Bleed/1, 2 = 10 Poison/1, 3 = 10 Burn/1, 4 = Confusion/2, 5 = Seal/1, 6 = Root/1, 7 = 6 Cripple/1, 8 = Stun/1.

Tarot Cards.Name: Dealer
Tarot Cards.Effect: Roll Xd13 where X is the number of players alive. P1 takes the first dice roll as damage, P2 the second roll, etc. This is immune to all outside factors.

Tarot Cards.Name: Gamble
Tarot Cards.Effect: Roll d7. 1 = Subtract the target's ATK and MAG, 2 = Subtract the higher of the target's offensive stats, 3 = Subtract the user's ATK, 4 = Add the user's ATK, 5 = Add the higher of the target's offensive stats, 6 = Add the user's MAG again, 7 = Add the user's ATK and the target's ATK and MAG. This ability is immune to outside factors to damage. (These effects do not count as negative damage factors. This move still adds the user's MAG.)

Tarot Cards.Name: Blackjack
Tarot Cards.Effect: On a successful hit, roll 2d10, treating 1s as either 1 or 11 (user’s choice). The user may choose to roll additional 1d10s to add to the roll. If the total is 17-20, this attack gains 1 base dice. On a total of 21, this attack instead gains 3 base dice. On a total of 22 or higher, the attack instead loses 2 base dice.

Tarot Cards.Name: Hi-Lo
Tarot Cards.Effect: Roll a 1d10. The user has to predict whether the next 1d10 result will be higher or lower than the result. Roll another 1d10, and the user again has to guess whether it will be higher or lower. Continue this until either the user chooses to stop, mispredicts, or correctly guesses 5 times. This attack's roll is Xd10, where X = two times the amount of correct guesses. On a failed guess, the ability loses half of its total base dice.

Tarot Cards.Name: Full House
Tarot Cards.Effect: Roll 3d3. For every 3 rolled, this attack gains +1 die. Only add half MAG.

Tarot Cards.Name: House Advantage
Tarot Cards.Effect: Targets are inflicted with -7 DMG/1. Each target may choose to roll a d10 and a d2 together. If the d2 rolls 1, add the d10 to their debuff, if it rolls 2, subtract it instead.

Tarot Cards.Name: Stacked Deck
Tarot Cards.Effect:
In place of an accuracy roll, roll a 1d14 for an effect. 
1 = Set the user's HP to 1,
2 = The user is Stunned next turn and Stacked Deck deals no damage, 
3 = The opponent is healed by the roll, 
4 = The attack misses, 
5 = 0.5x damage, 
6 = This user takes recoil equal to half the damage dealt by this attack, 
7 = Cleanse all statuses and numerical debuffs from the user & reset their other moves' frequencies,
8 = This attack has bomb dice,
9 = Inflict 5 Burn, Bleed & Poison/1 on the target (stacks with other statuses) for one turn,
10 = The user stores a reroll of a Cards non-1d20 secondary effect,
11 = Inflicts 1.5x damage,
12 = Target is Sealed/1, 
13 = Target is Stunned/1, 
14 = This attack has unremovable thrice dice.
